attributes.action: specify the appropriate channel(s) when rejecting a petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many petitions have been rejected because "It was an issue for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel". It would be far more helpful to say what the appropriate channel(s) would be in such an event so that the matter can be properly pursued.

rejection.details: Please email your comments to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
